artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Yamamotoya Heikichi; Manufacturer: Sakai Kōkodō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Poem: Maho kakete/ Yabase ni kaeru/ fune wa ima/ uchide no hama o/ ato no oikaze
真帆かけて　八橋にかへる　船はいま　うち出のはまを　あとの追風
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: The Eight Views of Ōmi (Ōmi hakkei no uchi 近江八景之内)
title: Returning Sails at Yabase
